title: Can anyone confirm if Vodafone UK network locks their Pixel 4 phones?
content:
Can anyone who received a Pixel 4 XL from Vodafone on a contract please confirm if it was locked to the Vodafone network or not?
Have asked Vodafone - they can't confirm and I don't have a different provider SIM to test with.
Thanks
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
